I've uploaded a small MP3 soundfile to my intro page using the UI, but when I start the game, the file refuses to play.

I searched the forum and read a reply which stated Firefox won't play soundfiles (at least not MP3s)

I decided this was my problem so loaded up IE just to check, and found this OS wouldn't play the file either.

Any ideas? And is there any way to get sound clips to play for FF users?

Posts.EditableText: Firefox don't support the mp3 file format unfortunately. Chrome and Safari do and IE 9 too iirc but not earlier versions. You could get the sound to work on multiple browsers by uploading the file formats that do work but you'd need to do some coding in html5 too - you wouldn't be able to get it to happen using the Quest GUI.
